commentBody:
"The son of a West Indies cricket official, Powell grew up in Nevis, one of the islands that forms the federation of Saint Kitts and Nevis."
"A clear demonstration of why the verb in a relative clause like this, describing a group, needs to be plural. You wouldn’t say one island forms the federation; rather, Nevis is one of the islands that, together, “form” the federation."

Please keep this explanation in your hip pocket for presentation to readers who simply don't get why the verb needs to be plural in these constructions.
